text:
="preserve">Image:Mia Kirshner red lighted cropped 2.jpg|thumb|Mia Kirshner 2009
Mia Kirshner (January 25, 1975) is an actress that stars primarily on television. She starred as Jenny Schecter in "The L Word" and Mandy in "24". She has, however, starred in some movies. She was born next to Toronto.
